languages.text: Пронизанный магнитными нитями плащ управляется встроенной в застежку кристаллической матрицей. Он — наказание оступившемуся помощнику, из чьей кожи он и изготовлен. Глаза слуги следят за тем, что творится за спиной его хозяина, ведь гемункул не даровал ему смерти или милосердного права не осознавать своего жалкого положения.

A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. A servant was skinned to make it, as a punishment for failure. The servant's eyes are forever watching the wearer's back, as the Haemonculus did not grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.
languages.original_text: Пронизанный магнитными нитями плащ управляется встроенной в застежку кристаллической матрицей. Он — наказание оступившемуся помощнику, из чьей кожи он и изготовлен. Глаза слуги следят за тем, что творится за спиной его хозяина, ведь гемункул не даровал ему смерти или милосердного права не осознавать своего жалкого положения.

traits.locale_text: A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. It's a punishment for the missteps of one of the servants, whose skin was used to make it. The servant's eyes are constantly watching the wearer's back since Haemonculus didn't grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. It's a punishment for the missteps of one of the servants, whose skin was used to fashion it. The servant's eyes are constantly watching the wearer's back since Haemonculus didn't grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. It's a punishment for the missteps of one of the servants, whose skin was used to fashion it. The servant's eyes are constantly watching the wearer's back since Haemonculus didn't grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. A servant was skinned to make it, as a punishment for failure. The servant's eyes are forever watching the wearer's back, as the Haemonculus did not grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. A servant was skinned to make it, as a punishment for failure. The servant's eyes are forever watching the wearer's back, as the Haemonculus did not grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

languages.text: 留め具のクリスタル・マトリックスによってコントロールされる磁気の糸が注入されたマント。従者のひとりの不始末に対する罰として剥がされた皮膚から作られている。従者の目は常に着用者の背中を見張っている。ハモンキュラスは彼に死の解放も、自分の悲惨な状況に気づかないという慈悲深い権利も与えなかった。
languages.original_text: A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. A servant was skinned to make it, as a punishment for failure. The servant's eyes are forever watching the wearer's back, as the Haemonculus did not grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

traits.locale_text: 留め具のクリスタル・マトリックスによってコントロールされる磁気の糸が注入されたマント。従者のひとりの不始末に対する罰であり、その者の皮膚がこのマントの製造に使われた。従者の目は常に着用者の背中を見張っている。ハモンキュラスは彼に死の解放も、自分の悲惨な状況に気づかないという慈悲深い権利も与えなかった。

languages.text: 这件斗篷上绣着磁力线，由搭扣中的水晶矩阵控制。斗篷是用某个仆人的人皮做成的，那个仆人犯下了大错，招致这样的惩罚。仆人的眼睛始终盯着装备者的后背，血伶人并没有仁慈地赐予那位仆人死亡，而是把他变成了现在的样子，让他在永恒的痛苦中受到折磨。
languages.original_text: A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. A servant was skinned to make it, as a punishment for failure. The servant's eyes are forever watching the wearer's back, as the Haemonculus did not grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

traits.locale_text: 这件斗篷上绣着磁力线，由搭扣中的水晶矩阵控制。斗篷是用某个仆人的人皮做成的，那个仆人犯下了大错，招致这样的惩罚。仆人的眼睛始终盯着装备者的后背，血伶人并没有仁慈地赐予那位仆人死亡，而是把他变成了现在的样子，让他在永恒的痛苦中受到折磨。

languages.text: Una capa impregnada de hilos magnéticos controlados por una matriz de cristal en el cierre. Para su elaboración se desolló a un sirviente como castigo y material. Los ojos del sirviente vigilan eternamente la espalda del portador, ya que el Hemónculo no le concedió la liberación de la muerte ni el derecho de ignorar misericordiosamente su condición.
languages.original_text: A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. A servant was skinned to make it, as a punishment for failure. The servant's eyes are forever watching the wearer's back, as the Haemonculus did not grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

traits.locale_text: Una capa impregnada de hilos magnéticos controlados por una matriz de cristal en el cierre. Es un castigo por los errores de uno de los sirvientes, cuya piel se utilizó para confeccionarla. Los ojos del sirviente vigilan constantemente la espalda del portador, ya que el Hemónculo no le concedió la liberación de la muerte ni el derecho de ignorar misericordiosamente su condición.

languages.text: Ein Umhang, der von magnetischen Fäden durchzogen ist. Sie lassen sich durch eine Kristallmatrix in der Schnalle kontrollieren. Ein Diener wurde für seine Herstellung gehäutet ... als Strafe für sein Versagen. Die Augen des Dieners sind für immer auf den Rücken des Trägers gerichtet, da der Haemonculus ihm weder den Tod, noch die gnädige Unkenntnis seines erbärmlichen Zustandes gewährt hat.
languages.original_text: A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. A servant was skinned to make it, as a punishment for failure. The servant's eyes are forever watching the wearer's back, as the Haemonculus did not grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

traits.locale_text: Ein Umhang, der von magnetischen Fäden durchzogen ist. Sie lassen sich durch eine Kristallmatrix in der Schnalle kontrollieren. Eine Strafe für die Fehltritte eines Dieners, aus dessen Haut der Gegenstand hergestellt wurde. Die Augen des Dieners blicken ständig hinter den Rücken des Trägers, da der Haemonculus ihm weder den Tod geschenkt hat noch die gnadenvolle Unkenntnis seines erbärmlichen Zustands.

languages.text: Une cape brodée de fils magnétiques contrôlés par une matrice cristalline incrustée dans le fermoir et conçue à partir de la peau d'un serviteur en gage de punition. Les yeux du serviteur surveillent constamment les arrières du porteur, puisque l'hémoncule lui a refusé la douce délivrance de la mort, et même le droit de ne pas être conscient de son état.
languages.original_text: A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. A servant was skinned to make it, as a punishment for failure. The servant's eyes are forever watching the wearer's back, as the Haemonculus did not grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

traits.locale_text: Une cape brodée de fils magnétiques contrôlés par une matrice cristalline incrustée dans le fermoir et conçue à partir de la peau d'un serviteur en gage de punition pour la bévue qu'il avait commise. Les yeux du serviteur surveillent constamment les arrières du porteur, puisque l'hémoncule lui a refusé la douce délivrance de la mort, et même le droit de ne pas être conscient de son état.

languages.text: Üzerine, tokasındaki bir kristal matris ile kontrol edilebilen manyetik ipler yerleştirilmiş bir pelerin. Başarısızlığının cezası olarak derisi yüzülen bir hizmetkârdan üretilmiş. Hizmetkârın gözleri, daimî olarak kuşanan kişinin arkasını gözlüyor. Haimonkulus ona ne ölüm ne de bu zavallı varoluşunun farkında olmama merhametini bahşetmiş.
languages.original_text: A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. A servant was skinned to make it, as a punishment for failure. The servant's eyes are forever watching the wearer's back, as the Haemonculus did not grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

traits.locale_text: Üzerine, tokasındaki bir kristal matris ile kontrol edilebilen manyetik ipler yerleştirilmiş bir pelerin. Yapılabilmesi için, bir hizmetkârın, başarısızlığının cezası olarak derisi yüzülmüş. Hizmetkârın gözleri, daimî olarak kuşanan kişinin arkasını gözlüyor. Haimonkulus ona ölüm de bahşetmemiş, bu zavallı varoluşunun farkında olmama merhametini de.
